history.i: Removed label control from generate from type dialog.
Can now be generated from custom random parameter.
Test code button now instead of try compile.
Decimal separator can be set here.
For parameters and connection proxy GUI.
A stresstest could not be stopped before the test was actually started (while the schedule timer was running).
When clicking around the view was very prone to scroll to the wrong place.
Connections could not be tested from here anymore.
Numeric parameters did not always respect its given boundaries.
